#summary A screencast of a demo session of Archimetrix.

= Screencast =

There is a two-part screencast of Archimetrix which shows the basic Archimetrix process. It makes use of the Store example which is publicly available for [http://archimetrix.googlecode.com/files/StoreExample.zip download].
